title: I can't buy any ip 6300 champion or others
body: I have already got 6300, but I can't buy any champion which is worth 6300 ip.  It said that i have not enough IP. Does any one have same bug like it?

replies.body: You can open the Legacy Client to buy champions if you're having the IP Bug in the Shop.  It will still work fine, though when you log back into the Alpha, you will still have your IP until you play your first game, though you will still have access to the champion you purchased.
I don't have old one  legacy client......
When (you) open the client, on the bottom of the login where you input your data, there is a button that says "Launch Legacy Client."  It's available to everyone until they phase it out completely.
got it. Thank you so much
Try closing it and relogging in?
Common IP glitch that has existed for a while, the amount being displayed is not what you actually have.
